string.value: |Koko wa warui tokorodesu. Juuyoona riyuu ga nai kagiri, kono numa ni hamaritakunai.
|Dooyara koko ga Hoomaa ga hanashite ita basho no yooda. Koko de sawa o watatte mimasu.
|Roojin wa damashimasendeshita. Surarii no soo no shita ni wa katai soko ga arimashita. Kono sakini wa nani ga matte iru nodarou ka?
GAADO|Hanarete kudasai! Fushin'na kooi wa koogeki to minasa remasu.
|Anata wa watashi ga hitsuyoo to suru nimotsu o hakonde kurete imasu. Kandai ni o shiharai itashimasu.
GAADO|Shokei-chuu ni ?? yakunin ni wairo o okurou to shita!
|Nani ka warui koto o shinakereba naranai yooda. Shuujin o kaihoo shi, shi hookoo subete ni korogarimasu. Futatabime no chansu wa arimasen.
GAADO|Min'na juu ni mukatte! Kono namaikina otoko ni hoo shikkookan to no renraku hoohoo o oshiete yarou!
|Anata jishin ga kore o nozonde ita nodesu. Juuyoona koto wa, shuujin o toreeraa ni butsukenai kotodesu. Hoka no min'na mo aoi honoo de moeagarimashou!
|Nani o matteimasu ka? Watashi no kuruma ni notte kudasai. Isoide kudasai, karera wa tasuke o yobu kamo shiremasen!
RIIDAA|Watashi o kaihoo shite kurete arigatoo, mishiranu hito yo. Shikashi, anata no dooki wa nanidesu ka? Shinraidekiru ka doo ka wakarimasen.

|Watashi wa anatagata no sentoo-in-tachi to, watashi ga hitsuyoo to suru mono to hikikae ni anatagata o kaihoo suru to iu kyootei o musubimashita. Soshite, karera wa keiyaku shuuryoo o enki shita hoo ga yoideshou!
|Un ga warukatta, shuujin no kuruma ga atsui te ni ochita. Kare wa nakunarimashita, soshite watashi wa kageki-ha ni teikyoo dekiru mono wa nani mo arimasen...
|Dooyara sooko o kyoosei-teki ni senkyo suru koto ni nari-sooda. Taishita shigoto wa arimasen!
SHEFU|Tachiirikinshi kuiki!
|Nanite kotoda! Kore wa nani... ? Naze kodaibito wa sono yoona kikai o hitsuyoo to shita nodeshou ka?
|Kono kaibutsu wa Kaimon e no tsuuro o mamotte iru. Nantoka kare o shori suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu... Tsuujoo no dangan ga kare no kawa ni kooka ga aru ka doo ka wa wakarimasen.
|Koko wa Hoomaa ga shimeshita no to onaji bashodesuga,-mon ga miatarimasen. Sore wa subete mudadesu ka?

|Mizu no naka kara dete kuru mono wa nanidesu ka? Watashitachi wa heiwa o yumemiru koto shika dekimasen... 2-Banme no monsutaa ga yattekuru toki ni choodo 1-biki no monsutaa o shitometa tokorodeshita... Shikashi, koreha motto odayakadesu.

|Marude watashi o kuchi no naka ni sasotte iru yooda. To iu koto de, koko ga umi no mondesu! Kaibutsu no haranouchi de, watashi wa shintaku ni mukatte oyogimasu. Mochiron kowaidesu... Maa, ushinau mono wa nani mo arimasen. Zenshin nomi!
|Korera no sanzoku wa shoonin ni kanshoo shinaku narimashita.
|Nokotte iru no wa sooko no kaihoo ni tsuite orumu ni shiraseru koto dakedesu.
Kono eria o hanaretaidesu ka?
Mada michi ga wakaranainode, koko ni tomarimasu.
Soko ni wa rikaidekinai nanika ga aru. Soko ni wa ikimasen.
